# lazyforward

Simplify maintenance of NSE-SE pairs. Hypothetical `dplyr` example:

```
#' @export
#' @name mutate
lazyforward::def("mutate")

#' @export
#' @keywords internal
mutate_ <- function (.data, ..., .dots) { UseMethod("mutate_") }
```

The result:

```{r}
lazyforward::lazyforward("mutate_", asNamespace("dplyr"))
```
